summary: Now before you start screaming saying, \'\'WHAT THE HECK IS THIS? THIS IS NOT THE MEGATON HAMMER FROM OCARINA OF TIME!!!\'\' Just slow done there. This is my first mod and I was messing around with the creation kit, and I stink with it. Just go and read the full description.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod and I\'ve been messing around with the creation kit. As you can tell this is what I got. It can be obtained by bringing up the command console with the ` key, or the ~ key (those are the same key on the keyboard) and entering player.additem 4d000d63 * (* represents the amount you want). I wanted to add the mesh of the Megaton Hammer from Ocarina of Time into the game, and the sound from Ocarina of Time, but I don\'t know how. If anyone knows how to feel free to comment and tell me how in a HIGHLY detailed comment, or tell me the name of a video that explains it. I guess this mod really is just a renaming of the steel war-hammer and a stat change of it. Please report any problems and I will try to fix them! (Yes I know that this is just the steel war-hammer changed up a little).

INSTALLATION
Use NMM or download manually.  

UPDATING
Delete the old file and add the new one.

To do
1. ItalicMan said that he would do a reskin for me so that will be awesome! (once again if ItalicMan does it thank you so much!)

2. Put it into Breezehome.

OTHER
I would appreciate it if someone would give me an idea for a new mod!
author: spiderman0123

files.name: Megaton Hammer from The Legend of Zelda
